paper_abstract: The concept of generalized S-convergence of net (x(i))(i is an element of I) on fuzzy directedcomplete posets (for short, fuzzy dcpos) is proposed and its relationship with the generalized Scott topology is studied. It is shown that for an arbitrary fuzzy dcpo, the generalized S-convergence is topological if and only if the fuzzy dcpo is continuous.
paper_title: The generalized S-convergence on fuzzy directed-complete posets
